Detailed Description

The App3 class provides visual information for 3D objects.

As well as all the visual information provided in the App class, the App3 class adds materials and lighting.

See also:
App
Visual
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

App3::App3 (  ) [inline]

Default constructor.

Default material, local lighting and empty list of lights. Inherit lights by default.
